latest_release.notes:
Noto Sans Adlam v3.002

This release:

- Corrects the form of ADLAM VOWEL LENGTHENER when nukta is present (#3)
- Adds a medial form to ADLAM NASALIZATION MARK (#4)
- Fixes an interpolation bug (#13)
- Removes the fraction slash character (#2)
- Improves the positioning of marks on the dotted circle (#9)
- Removes the erroneous 'case' feature (#10)
- Makes the HAMZA stack on modifier glyphs (#11)

Noto Sans Adlam Unjoined

This release adds a missing languagesystem, fixing mark positioning.

latest_release.notes:
Noto Kufi Arabic v2.110

This release:

* Fixes the shape of Kashmiri Yeh (#245, #205)
* Fixes the shape of U+FDFC (#260, thanks to @khaledhosny)
* Works around jeem bug in Adobe’s pre-HarfBuzz composers (#247, thanks to @khaledhosny)
* Fixes the width of some presentation forms

Noto Naskh Arabic v2.020

This release:

* Fixes some interpolation issues (#226, #262)
* Adjusts the size and positioning of some diacritics (#252, thanks to @MonongaFont
* Fixes the shape of Kashmiri Yeh (#245, #205)
* Fixes the shape of U+FDFC (#260, thanks to @khaledhosny)
* Works around jeem bug in Adobe’s pre-HarfBuzz composers (#247, thanks to @khaledhosny)

Noto Naskh Arabic UI v2.017

This release de-encodes the U+2011 non-breaking hyphen character.

Noto Sans Arabic 2.013

This release:

* Adjusts the positioning of some diacritics (#268, #266, #265)
* Fixes the shape of Kashmiri Yeh (#245, #205)
* Fixes the shape of U+FDFC (#260, thanks to @khaledhosny)
* Fixes the shape of alef with hamza below (#246, thanks to @khaledhosny)
* Works around jeem bug in Adobe’s pre-HarfBuzz composers (#247, thanks to @khaledhosny)
* Fixes a number of Fontspector fails

Noto Sans Arabic UI v2.011

This release unencodes the previously encoded U+2011 non-breaking hyphen.

latest_release.notes:
Noto Sans Khojki v2.005

This release:

* Allows for kerning of sequences with marks (#13)

Noto Serif Khojki v2.005

This release:

* Improves the display of nukta combinations (#14, #22)
* Correct reorders the nukta + sukun combination (#15)
* Allow conjuncts to form in the presence of a nukta (#16)
* Uses the steeper alternative E vowel to avoid clashes (#17)

* Removes some unnecessary glyphs (#19)
* Adds the newly encoded characters QA (U+1123F) and SHORT I (U+11240)

issues.title: Virama positioning

latest_release.notes:
Noto Sans v2.015

This release fixes some kinks in the six.osf glyph and removes some errant glyphs (#405)

Noto Sans Mono v2.014

This release:

* Updates the shape of U+AB5A SMALL LETTER Y WITH SHORT RIGHT LEG to match Unicode 15.1
* Improves U+019E SMALL LETTER N WITH LONG RIGHT LEG and U+A798 CAPITAL LETTER F WITH STROKE
* Improves the hook shape on V WITH HOOK (#178)
* Ensures that diacritic stacks in Romanian are not reordered (#214)
* Corrects the anchoring of double-width diacritics (#132)
* Support the sequence U+2E2B, U+032E for typicon notation (#63)
* Corrects the shape of U+2E49 DOUBLE STACKED COMMA, U+2229 INTERSECTION and U+A789 MODIFIER LETTER COLON (#59, #207, #217)
* Improves the anchoring of U+A69E COMBINING CYRILLIC LETTER EF and U+2C77 SMALL LETTER TAILLESS PHI (#220, #69)
* Adds IPA localizations to Greek script (#110)
* Makes full-width and half-width braces different widths (#61)
* Corrects anchor positions on U+1D16 TOP HALF O and U+1D17 BOTTOM HALF O (#67)

Noto Serif v2.015

This release:

* Removes some errant glyphs (#405)
* Adds the figurespace to the onum feature (#39)
* Fixes the use of Iota in components (#497)
* Removes kinks in `two` and other glyphs.

Noto Serif Display v2.009

This is an administrative release. No changes have been made to any glyphs.

latest_release.notes:
Noto Sans Syriac v3.000

This release:
* Comprises only of the Estrangela style of Noto Sans Syriac
* Interpolates as a variable font
* Fixes the naming of the stylistic sets (#1)
* Fixes the shape of U+0724 final semkath (#6)
* Fixes a problem with the rish-dieresis ligature (#8)
* Cleans up some of the OpenType layout code
* and fixes various fontbakery fails.

Noto Sans Syriac Eastern v3.001

This release restores a number of missing ligatures and other shaping rules.

Noto Sans Syriac Western v3.001

This release fixes the weight of glyphs which change their shape (dalesh rish, shin, etc.)
